overview: For 15 years the large estate of Samuel Arnold has stood silent and empty. But like a midwinter's breeze, in the lonely hours of the night, something stirs in both the dreams and reality, unable to find any peace. When Aubrey, last of the family line and leader of an all-girl band, moves her band into the house, the lurking horror of her family's true legacy reveals itself as she fights desperately to find the truth and reject her dark inheritance.
title: Dreams of the Dead
